attributes.title: SHOCKING AND TRUE
attributes.review: i opened the app and immediately i couldnt breathe. It was like an illusion. so i exited as quickly as possible be careful guys and gals they are out for anyone

Sadly there is no possible way to leave 0 stars ✨ 

Anyways enjoy these lyrics 
r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️

Also this app doesn’t work, my cockroach is on fire. Instructions were way off. Why is there a Cheeto on my screen when I open it?????
Beyond disgusting I can’t believe content like this is allowed on the App Store. This app is truly a disgrace to society. It needs to be removed IMMEDIATELY periodt

attributes.title: If I could give it zero stars I would.
attributes.review: It’s just a terrible app and frankly useless.

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: This app is fake news all I got was bad music playing while this orange Cheeto is racist do not get this app😡

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: Doesn’t even open most of the time

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: worst app ever took forever to download i dont recommend getting this app took a lot of my storage just isn’t worth it.

attributes.title: wasteful app
attributes.review: i usually don’t leave reviews but this app was truly the worst. smh... i wonder why its even on the app store when its such a bad app 😒 hope app store does something about this hateful app soon 😔 it would be a service to everyone

attributes.title: I will not support a rapist!
attributes.review: Trump is a child predator and a rapist and I demand that this app be removed! How can the US allow literal rapists to run for presidency?! I am absolutely disgusted in America, but not as disgusted in YALLS “President”. SICK!

attributes.title: It MURDERED me
attributes.review: I was downloading this app to show NOTHING BUT LOVE AND RESPECT to my favorite fruit. The orange. I spent a little time on it , AND BAM!! I was MURDERED!!! Turns out out this app isn’t about oranges. Kinda disappointed:/
